title: Love, my friend, is not Easy !
description: Set in the backdrop of the IT industry in the 90s, 'Love, my friend, is not Easy !' is the story of three metro indians whose lives take a dramatic turn when they discover love.A young brilliant finance whiz sails through good and bad times in her inimitable style- a combination of cheer & courage. Will she last the turmoil in her life even as she saves many around her?An uber achiever & exceptional strategist reaches exhilarating heights of excellence in life. What has fate scripted for him next?A debauch debonair CEO, undertakes a cathartic journey from despondency to dependability. Will he survive his fatal attraction?
author: GEETA RAVI
